translation: Jhads andr yus mal dushmns nishhi ḥạṣil krnh yyhi tth chhi mali ghnymt vnan. Byakh nav chuh tmyuk nfl tmkue jmʿ gvv anfal. Chvnkh yth svrh shryfs mnz chhi jhadkụ̄ th mali ghnymtkụ̄ aḥkam, amy munasibth āv yth sạrse svrh shryfs svrh anfal nav thavnh. Yhi ḥkum āv byan krnh tmhi vqth yymhi vqth jngi bdrs mnz ṣḥabh ṣạbn andr jvan mjạhdn th bddyn andr akhtlaf spud. Jvanv dvp mali ghnymtkụ̄ ḥqdar chhi asụ̄ bddyv ṣạḥbv dvp chvnkh asụ̄ thi ạsụ̄ tuhndụ̄ mdd gar lhādha gczihh ashi thi amhi mnz ḥṣh trun yohe akhtlaf kvr timv pysh drkhdmt nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm. Tmiy saʿth spud yhi āyhi krymh nạzil, Allah tʿālyā chuh frmavan prczhan chhi tohyhi ṣḥabh ṣạb ya rsvl Allah mali ghnymt khi tqsymuk ḥukm, tvhụ̄ frmạviyvkh kh mali ghnymt chuh khdae sund kyazi ftḥ v nuṣrt ʿṭa krvun chuh sue. Byyhi tihndis pyghmbrh sund yihndi vasṭh Allah tʿālyā aḥkam jạriy kran chuh, ps khvucziv khdays byyhi kriv bahmy tʿlqatn aṣlaḥ. Panh vạnụ̄ mh thạviv bghẓ v ḥsd, ḥkum mạniv khdae sund byyhi tihndis pyghmbrh sund hrgah tvhụ̄ baayman chhiv.

Baayman ge nh mgr time yimn nishhi yylhi dhkr krnh āyhi khdae snz, tihnz ʿẓmt zyri nẓr anith chhi nttan tihndụ̄ dil, byyhi yylhi prnh yivan chhi timn nishhi khdae sndụ̄ āyat. Huran th mẓbvṭ chuh spdan tihund ayman byyhi chhi tim pnnise prvrdigars petth aʿtmad th tvkl kran.
Tim baayman ge time yim qạyim th brpa chhi thavan nemaz. Byyhi yus mal asiy timn ʿṭa kvr tmhi mnz chhi khrch kran khdae snzi vthi andr.
Yime kyah ge pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ baayman, tihndiy khạṭr chhi tihndis prvrdigars nishhi thdụ̄ drjh byyhi bdd mghfrt th ʿztuk rzq.

Yihund mali ghnymts mnz akhtlaf krun byyhi nh tihnzi mrẓy muṭạbq yhi tqsym spdun chuh akh mṣlḥt mvjvb. Yithh pạtthụ̄ tvhụ̄ kddiv pnnụ̄ prvrdigarn pnnhi gri bsty th shhr mnz akis khaṣ muṣlḥts petth yʿny mali ghnymts andr yihnz mrẓy muvạfq tqsym nh spdns mnz thi chhe mṣlḥt. Yithh pạtthụ̄ tihndi mdynh shryf mnz mydani bdrs kun kddns andr mṣlḥt ạs, drḥaltykh akh jmaʿthah ạsụ̄ baaymanv andr tihndis tmhi vqth kis mdynh shryfh andr nyrns napsnd kran.

Bḥth v qẓyhi ạsụ̄ kran tim tohyhi sintụ̄ mshvrh pạtthụ̄ pzi kthhi mnz tmkhi ẓạhir spdnh pth. Be slaḥ vsaman jngs nyrun qryshn sintụ̄ jng krun, yim ba slaḥ vsaman ạsụ̄ avs timn tyvut mushkl lbnh yivan, zn tim pknavnh ạsụ̄ yivan marnh khạṭr achhn ddyshman. Yʿny tim ạsụ̄ mrnkh asbab be srvsamany pnnụ̄ vuchhan.

Tvhụ̄ kriv suh vqt yad yylhi Allah tʿālyā hn bdhryʿh vḥy bvasṭh pyghmbr ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm vʿdh frmvv kh dushmnn hnzv doyv jmaʿtv andrh chhe akh jmaʿt ẓrvur tihndi khạṭr timn petth spdiv tvhụ̄ ghạlib, tvhụ̄ ạsiv psnd kran kh ghạr muslḥ jmaʿthe gczihh sạnis aths mnz yinụ̄ yimn sintụ̄ nh muqablh th jng pyyhi ha krun mgr, Allah tʿālyā avs yczhan kh suh pzraviha pvz pnnhi ḥukmh sintụ̄ byyhi galhi ha mvul kạfrn hund.
Kạfrn hund mvul glnh sintụ̄ thi yuth pzyuk pvz āsun th apzyuk apuz āsun Allah tʿālyā var thạbit kri agr chhi nafrmann yiy tn suh napsnde.

Yhi gvv sue vqt yymhi saʿth fryad ạsiv kran tvhụ̄ pnnis prvrdigars kun mngan ạsiv ts ftḥ vnuṣrt ps kr tmụ̄ aijabt tuhndis mngns, yhi frmavnh sintụ̄ kh bh kr tohyhi mdd akh sas mlk svznh sintụ̄ yim akh akis sintụ̄ āsn rvuzith yʿny gnddith.

Yhi mlạykn hndi dhryʿh mdd krun kvrnh Allah tʿālyā hn mgr tuhndi khosh krnh khạṭr. Yuth tuhndụ̄ dil ftḥ vnuṣrt vuchhith khosh gczhn. Byyhi yuth tuhndụ̄ dil qrar rttn, ḥqyqts mnz chhnh nuṣrt th yạry mgr khdae sndi ṭrfh, pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ Allah tʿālyā chuh zbrdst th ḥikmt vvl.

Byyhi pạviv czyts suh vqt yymhi vqth Allah tʿālyā hn tohyhi nindri hnz mae vjnv pnnhi ṭrfh. Tohyhi pvurh skvn th qrar dinh khạṭr, byyhi pạviv czyts tmhi brvntth yymhi saʿth avsun tohyhi petth āsman kh ṭrfh rvud trvmut. Yuth tohyhi tmhi rvud sintụ̄ pak kri beghsl krn ghsl th be ṭhart krn ṭhart, yuth suh dvur kri tohyhi nishhi shyṭan sndi vsvsch napạky, byyhi yuth tmiy sintụ̄ tuhndụ̄ dil mẓbvṭ kri, byyhi yuth tmhi rvud pynh sintụ̄ tuhndụ̄ khvr var drravi. Kyazi sykh chhe rvud pynh sintụ̄ dran. Myczi chhe rvud pynh sintụ̄ rb vothan.

Byyhi pạviv suh vqt czyts yymhi saʿth tuhund prvrdigar ḥkum svzan avs timn mlạykn kun yim tuhndi mddkhạṭr svznh āmtụ̄ ạsụ̄. Ae mlạykv vsiv myanyn baayman bndn hndi mdd khạṭr. Bh thi chuhs tuhndi khạṭr mdd gar, ae mlạykvme mddgar zạnith thạviv tvhụ̄ mẓbvṭ baaymann hndụ̄ dil, bh travv kạfrn hndyn diln andr khvf v vḥsht, ps shmshyr czndd diyvukh grdnn petth byyhi czttyvukh tanh tanh.
Yhi sza chuh timn amyi sbbh kh timv kr mukhalft khdae snz byyhi tihndis pyghmbr snz, byyhi yus akhah khdae snz byyhi tihndis pyghmbr snz mukhalft kri ts kri Allah tʿālyā skht ʿdhabs grftar.
Yymhi ʿdhabuk mzh cz hiv tvhụ̄ byyhi zạniv yhi kth kh kạfrn hndi khạṭr chuh nari jhnmuk ʿdhab ạkhrts andr amhi dnyakh ʿdhab ʿlavh.
Ae baaymanv yylhi tvhụ̄ kạfrn sintụ̄ muqablh krnhi lgiv pthr zmyns petth vsith prạriv pyad fvj bnith, ps mh phiriv timn kun pusht pnnụ̄ pan bchavnh khạṭr.

Yus akhah amhi dohh kạfrn kun thr phirith czlun hyyhi, mgr he pusht phirn timn kun jngkhi kunhi mṣlḥt khạṭr ya aimdạdy fvjs sintụ̄ shạmil spdnh khạṭr tylhi chuhnh kanhh ḥrj. Nth yus czlnh khạṭr timn kun pusht phiri, ps btḥqyq suh āv khdae snz bddbe dhạriy hyth, tihnz jae chhe nari jhnm, setthah ychh jae chhu suh jhnm.

Ae mslmanv tohyhi mạriyvkh nh tim kạfr jngi bdrs mnzblkh mạrụ̄ tim Allah tʿālyā hn panh, ae pyghmbri brḥq tohyhi nh ḥẓ chhchiv nh myczi motth yylhi bẓạhir tvhiy chhchvh blkh chhch so Allah tʿālyā hn. Yhi kvr Allah tʿālyā hn akh yuth kạfrn mghlvb kri, byyhi yuth Allah tʿālyā baaymann pnnhi ṭrfh rut anʿām v aḥsan ʿṭa kri. Yʿny kạm krḥqyqtaan tmụ̄ panh mgr soe kạm krn mslmann hndyv athv ya nby krym sndi dsti mbarkh yuth tim amyuk thvab th ajr byyhi bvdd anʿām ḥạṣil krn, pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ Allah tʿālyā chuh yimn baaymann hnz sare kthh bvzvun byyhi yihund aʿmal v afʿāl pvur vuchhh vun.
Akh gyhi yhi kth. Doyim kth chhe yhi Allah tʿālyā hs ạsụ̄ kạfrn hndụ̄ sạriy tdbyr sust th bykar krnụ̄.

Ae kạfrv hrgah tvhụ̄ fạṣlh czhanddan chhiv byshk suh fạṣlh spud ẓạhir. Mslmann spzftḥ ḥạṣil yymhi sintụ̄ mʿlvum spud kh tihund dyn chuh pvz dyn. Tmiy dynch pzi pyrvy krnụ̄, vonụ̄ hrgah tvhụ̄ shrkh nishhi pth rvziv mslman spdiv, thi chuh tuhndi khạṭr setthah bhtr, hrgah tvhụ̄ dvbarh byyhi shrart kriv tylhi chh asụ̄ thi dvbarh aslams th mslmann mdd krnh khạṭr th kạfrn shkst dinh khạṭr tyar. Tohyhi mh rvzin khyal kh āyindh krv asụ̄ amhi khoth bvdd lshkr jmʿ yhi thạvizi yqyn kh hrgiz diyhi nh tohyhi kanhh faydh bdd jmaʿt tuhnz agrchhi ạsitn so setthah zyadh tʿdad kinụ̄. Byyhi chhe ḥqyqt kh Allah tʿālyā chuh baaymann sintụ̄ prth vqth mddgar.

Ae baaymanv frmanbrdạry kriv khdae snz byyhi tihndis pyghmbr snz byyhi mh kriv tihndyn aḥkamn tʿmyl krnh nishhi rvgrdạny. Drḥaltykh tvhụ̄ chuhv khdae sund klam pyghmbrsund vʿẓ bvzan. Tithe pạtthụ̄ kriv timn ḥukmn petth ʿml thi.
Tvhụ̄ mh ạsiv timn lvukn hiy yim zyvi sintụ̄ vnan chhi bvuz ashi mgr bvzan chhinh kynhh, ʿml chhinh tth petth kran kynhh.

Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ sarive jandarv andrh chhi bdtr Allah tʿālyā hs nishhi time yim pvz kth bvznh nishhi zrụ̄ āsn pzụ̄ kth vnnh nishhi klụ̄ āsn. Yimn nh pz kth kunhi qsmh fkri tran āshi. Pth ge tim yim aʿtqadh bavjvd ʿmlhi andr kvtạhiy krn yʿny mslman ạsith krn tʿmyl aḥkam krns andr susty tim ge nh bdtr mgr bd th ychh ge ẓrvur timn pzi tmhi nishhi pth rvzun.

Byyhi hrgah Allah tʿālyā timn kạfrn mnz zanhi hakanhh khạr vbrkthah tylhi shayd bvznavykh yʿny tvfyq diyhi hykh bvznuk. Tvpth hrgah bvz navihykh thi tvthi czlh hn th rvgrdạny krhn tim pzi nishhi buth phirith.

Ae baaymanv ashi yus ḥukmah kvr tohyhi yymhi brvntth kh tʿmyli aḥkam th aṭaʿt th frman brdạry kriv thi kvr ashi tuhndy fạydh khạṭr tmhi sintụ̄ bnhi tuhnz ḥyati abdy. Lhādha mạniv ḥukm khdae sund byyhi pyghmbri khdae sund, yylhi nad diyhi tohyhi suh pyghmbr khda tth kamhi kun yosh tohyhi zindh thaviyv dyns kun. Yymhi sintụ̄ dạymy zndgy mysr spdan chhe, byyhi zạniv akh kth Allah tʿālyā chuh tthvr spdan shkhṣs th tihndis dils mnz doyv ṭryqv. Akh gvv baaymanv sndis dils chuhnh aṭaʿt kh brkth kfrv mṣyyts kun nivan. Byakh gvv kạfr sndis dils chuhnh mukhalft kh shamth th nḥvsth ayman v aṭaʿts kun kanhh ath vth divan. Amiy andrh supd mʿlvm aṭaʿt vfrman brdạriy petth mdavmt th ddadd krun chuh setthah mufyd. Mukhalfts th nafrmạny petth ddadd krnụ̄ chhe setthah muẓir, byyhi zạniv yhi kth kh tvhụ̄ sạriy yiyiv ts mʿbvdi brḥqs nishhi svnbrnh. Sue diyhi frman brdarn rut jza nafrmann skht sza. Yithh pạtthụ̄ tohyhi petth pnnhi aṣlaḥ khạṭr frman brdạry vạjib chhe yithe pạtthụ̄ chuh vạjib tohyhi petth byyn lvukn hund aṣlaḥ krun. Timn mnz frman brdạry hund shvq pạd krun. Ath sintụ̄ hrgah mmkn spud yus zyvi sintụ̄. Mmkn spdi yus tʿlqat czttnh sintụ̄. Hrgah mmkn spdi yus ya ṣirf dils andr nfrt krnh sintụ̄. Yhi gvv bnim drjh aymanuk. Vrnh yus mdahnt kr, yʿny gnah vuchhi tvpth krinh tth trdyd tylhi chuh tmhi gunhuk vbal th sza ts shkhṣs thi. Yylhi ḥqyqt yhi chhe.
Lhādha khvucziv tth blayhi yosh nh khaṣ timne yạcz valnh yyhi. Yimv tohyhi andrh ẓlm v nafrmạny krblkh spdn tth mnz sạriy grftar, byyhi zạniv kh Allah tʿālyā sund ʿdhab chuh setthah skht.

Byyhi pạviv czyts yylhi tvhụ̄ hjrt brvntth km th kmzvr ạsiv mkh shryfs andr, ntth ạsv kh thph maninav lvukh, tth ḥals andr dicz vh chhpn jae khdayn mdynh shryfs andr. Byyhi krnv tạyyd pnnhi mdd sintụ̄, byyhi kvrnv rut rzq ʿṭa yuth tohyhi shkur gudhạry kriv.

Ae baaymanv asụ̄ chhi tohyhi mkhalft th nafrmạny nishhi yymhi mokhh mmanʿt kran kh tohyhi petth chhi khdae sndụ̄ th pyghmbri khdae sndụ̄ kynhh ḥq mtthi. Tim bja annh sintụ̄ vathi tohyhi nfʿ th fạydh. Nafrmạny sintụ̄ chuh timn ḥqvqn andr khll th nqṣan vaqʿ spdan. Yymhi sintụ̄ tuhndise nfʿs th fạyds mnz khll th nqṣan vaqʿ spdan chuh. Yylhi yhi kth tohyhi fikri tri. Lhādha mh trạviv khll byyhi mh kriv khda v rsvl sndyn ḥqn andr, yhi gvv ḥqyqts andr tuhund pnnyn qạbil ḥfaẓt chyzn andr khll th nqṣan vatnavun, diydh vdansth. Zạnith krith. Akthr avqat chuh maluk th avladn hund mḥbt mkhul spdan khda vrsvl snzi frman brdạry. Lhādha diyv tvhụ̄ khda vrsvl sndis mḥbt vaṭaʿts trjyḥ mal vavladn hndis mḥbts petth. Yuth asụ̄ vuchhv kus akhah chuh mal vavladn hndis mḥbt trjyḥ divan sạnis mḥbts petth.

Var zạniv kh tuhundụ̄ mal v avlad chhi akh āzmạysh th amtḥanuk chyz yhi zạniv kh Allah tʿālyā hs nishy chhe mzvurụ̄ timn lvukn hndi khạṭr yim tihundue mḥbt zyadh chhi thavan chhi byyn sarne hndi khoth.

Baaymanv hrgah tvhụ̄ khvucziv khdays tihnz kriv pvurh aṭaʿt, suh kri tohyhi aimtyạzy nishanh ʿṭa, byyhi kri dvur tuhnz bdyhi, byyhi krimghfrt tohyhi sarne gunhn. Allah tʿālyā chuh bvdd fẓl vvl. Pnnhi fẓl sintụ̄ kri suh amhi ʿlavh khbr km km chyz ʿṭayim nh vhm v gumans andr hykn yith.

Byyhi pạviv czyts yylhi tohyhi mtʿlq tdbyr th mshvrh kran ạsụ̄ daralndvs andr svchan ạsụ̄ tuhndi khạṭr qạd krnh khạṭr ya qtl krnh khạṭr, ya jlavṭn krnh khạṭr mkhtlf tdabyr, tim ạsụ̄ pnnhi khyalh tdbyr svchan, Allah tʿālyā thi avs pnnụ̄ tdabyr kran tihndụ̄ tdabyr bạṭl v bykar krnh khạṭr, Allah tʿālyā chuh bhtr th rut mẓbvṭ tdbyr krvun. Chnanchhi tihndụ̄ sạriy tdbyr spdụ̄ nakam. Nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm vatnạvụ̄ Allah tʿālyā hn timne kạfrn brvntth kinụ̄ pknạvith var kar bṣḥt v slamty mdynh mnvrs mnz.

Byyhi yylhi prnh ạsụ̄ yivan timn kạfrn brvntth knhi sạnụ̄ āyat. Vnan ạsụ̄ tim byshk ashi bvuz yhi klam yhi chuhnh kanhh mʿjzh. Hrgah asụ̄ aradh krv asụ̄ thi hykv yuth klam pysh krith, yhi chuhnh kynhh mgr be dlyl kthh pvnshh, yimh kthh brvntthmyn nishhi nql krnh āmcz chhe.

Amhi khoth chhe qạbli dhkr yhi kth kh yim ạsụ̄ vnan khdae hrgah yhi qrāni mjyd pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chuh chaniy ṭrfh tylhi travtmhi kh nh mannh khạṭr ashi petth āsman kh ṭrfh knhi rvud. Nth vatnav ashi nishhi kddur ʿdhab. Yhi ạs nh timn khbr kh khdae snzn kamyn andr chhe khaṣ mṣlḥcz āsan, ʿdhab nh krns mnz chhe kynhh vjvh āsan timn vjvhn th mvanʿn hund byan chuh amhi pth.

Allah tʿālyā krinh hrgiz timn ʿdhab tvhụ̄ timn mnz mvjvd āsnkis ḥals andr, byyhi kithh knụ̄ kri ha Allah tʿālyā timn ʿdhab yth ḥals andr tim āshn kunhi kunhi vqth kufr kh mṭạbq mghfrt mngan. Ṭvaf kran kran ghfrank pran.

Timn kyah khṣvṣyt ạs kh timn kriha Allah tʿālyā ʿdhab, tim ạsụ̄ bddụ̄ gnah kran lvukn th pyghmbri brḥqs ạsụ̄ pth rttan msjdi ḥrams nkhh yinh nishhi, ḥalankh ạsụ̄ nh tim lvukh msjdi hndi mtvly th aikhtyar vạlụ̄. Yymich qạblythe ạsụ̄ nh timn. Kunhi ṭryqh avs nh timn thi krnuk ḥq, tmikụ̄ akhtyar vạlụ̄ th mtvly āsnch qạblyt chhna mgr prhyzgar bndn tim ge baayman, lykn timv andrh chhi ddytth kintụ̄ yimn nh aamich khbre chhe.

Byyhi ạs nh nemaz tihnz khanh kʿbs nishhi mgr ạsv sintụ̄ shurinụ̄ vayinụ̄. Byyhi athv sintụ̄ czri pvp krun. Ath namʿqvl ḥrkts ạsụ̄ nemaz vnan, lhādha czhiv vonụ̄ ʿdhab tmhi kufr bdl yus tvhụ̄ kran ạsiv.

Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ yim kạfr chhi tim chhi mal pnun khrch kran lvukn mnz khdae snzi vthi nishhi pth rttnh khạṭr. Ho gyhi tihnz bdny ʿbadt yhi gyhi tihnz maly ʿbadt, āyindh thi rvzn tim amhi khạṭr mal khrch kran. Ptvlakh spdi suh mal tihndi khạṭr ḥsrtuk sbb. Ptvlakh spdn mghlvb th dhlyl. Yhi gvkh dnyahuk ʿdhab. Ạkhrtuk ʿdhab gvkh alg, yimv lvukv kufr kvr tim sạriy yin svnbravnh qyamtkụ̄ doh jhnms mnz svznh khạṭr.

Yuth Allah tʿālyā alg kri napak lvukn pak lvukv nishhi, byyhi diyhi brith napak lvukn akh akis petth, yʿny akh akis sintụ̄ nkhh nkhh thạvith khari timn sarne akh ddyrah. Tvpth diykh ykh vtth brith jhnms mnz, yime lvukh thi kyah ge tavn zd yth tavan zdgy nhaythe chuhnh.

Frmạviyvkh tvhụ̄ ya rsvl Allah ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm kạfrn yimn brvnttihm mẓmvn bvuzith kynhh athr spudmut āshi kh hrgah tim kufr v shirkh nishhi pth rvuzith mslman spdn timn yyhi brvntthmis sạrse bkhshạyish krnh, hrgah dbarh byyhi kufre krn bdstvr rvzn kufrse petth. Ps chhe brvntthmyn kạfrn hnz rvish gdhrymcze. Timv kyah kvr timn kyah bnyv.

Tvhụ̄ kriv ya rsvl Allah yimn kạfrn sintụ̄ jhad. Hrgah yim kufrse petth rvzn yvtanụ̄ yhi shrk v kufruk fitne spdi khtm, prth ṭrfh phhlhi dyn khdae sundue, tvpth hrgah tim pth rvzn kufr nishhi Allah tʿālyā chuh tihnz sare kamhi vuchhan.
Hrgah tim rvgrdạny krn. Tvhụ̄ rvziv mẓbvṭ. Khdae sund nav hyth kriv tihund muqablh. Tvhụ̄ zạniv pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ kh Allah tʿālyā chuh tuhund rfyq. Sue chuh tuhund rut rfyq th rut mddgar tuhund.

Byyhi zạniv yhi kth var kh btḥqyq yhi kynczhah tohyhi kạfrn nishhi mali ghnymt ḥạṣil kriv ps chuh tmyuk ḥkum. Tth sạrse gczhn panczh ḥṣh krnh yin.
